about_the_game:
Let the colors clash!

GG-Party is a party-game for up to 8 player. Grab your friends, choose your favourite colour, and get ready to defend it with all your power!

The Game consists of multiple Minigames, which you can experience in three gamemodes.

Minigame-Mode: Pick your favourite minigames, and challenge your friends directly!

Tournament-Mode: A gauntlet of many minigames, in which the player who collects the most money suitcase is crowned the winner!

The GG-Party-Mode: A gamemode with the main game interspersed with our colorful mini-games. In the main game, players navigate an open world. They can bribe bouncers and clans to block another player's passage, purchase jet skis, quads, and hoverboards, and must complete quests to earn money, such as delivering pizza, transporting certain packages to specific locations, repairing fuse boxes, washing cars for neighbors, etc. The goal is to become the first millionaire on the island to win the entire game. Additionally, players can buy kiosks, jet ski shops, quad shops, houses, and villas that generate rental income or sales proceeds from other players into their cash flow.

Author's comment: We've never seen this game mode in party games before. It's not a boring board game where you have to wait for 8 players to take their turns. That systems comes from old console games played with 3-4 players. GG-Party is a completely new party game with an open-world character.

In addition to new takes on minigame ideas, the game will also contains a few retro inspired minigames, though of course those too received a fresh coat of paint, to ensure both familiarity and a new and enjoyable experience. That coat of paint might cover rules, design or even the * type / genre *. Nostalgia and new experiences, mixed into a beautiful new hue.

Currently available mini-games with different modes such as Race, Deathmatch, Last Man Standing...:

• Paintball: Shoot your friends in this first person shooter game. Can you be the first to get 10 kills?

• Bomber Dudes: Blow up your friends, or at least blow up while trying.

• Run: Who will be the fastest? Find out in this third person race!

• Helicopter: Take to the skies, shoot rockets, and dominate! Be the first to achieve 8 kills and claim victory!

• RCMonstertrucks: Compete in an off-road RC showdown against friends. Will you be the first to cross the finish line and claim victory?

• Tanks: Command your tank in this fast-paced, third-person battle arena against friends.

• Hoverboards: Take a thrilling ride in a third-person hoverboard race through

• Camper Wash: Who will be the first to clean up their camper in this thrilling third-person washing simulator?

• Quad Race: Tear up the track on your quad bike in this adrenaline-fueled race against friends!

• Jet Ski Race: Make waves and race to victory on your jet ski in thrilling competitions against friends!

• Mini Golf: Putt your way through challenging courses in this fun and competitive mini golf game. Can you sink the ball first and outscore your friends?

• More than 30 mini-games are still in planning for 2025 and 2026, but our focus is currently on the open world.

This game is and will be supported for the long term. We will continue to work on this game, adding more game modes, mini-games, and so on over time.

So go ahead gather your friends and go 4 it!

Developer comment: We have our own art team working on unique characters and levels. Some of the current screenshots are still placeholders. We are in the process of replacing all placeholders, including the characters, with our own designs.
